participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: ambitious and determined, with a deep love for animals and nature.
participant_1.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: James Thompson
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and patient, with a passion for history and a keen interest in literature.
participant_2.background: i am a museum tour guide. i'm partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea. i have a big library at home. i grow roses in my garden.
